name: Bahamian Rhapsody
description:
Kaylee MacMillan, a writer and comedian based in London, is not having a great year. Her TV series “The Chaotic life of Kay” has been cancelled and her partner of five years has just left her. When Julie, her business manager and close friend, suggests that she attend an entertainment industry conference in the Bahamas to try to connect to pitch a show to one of the streaming giants, Kaylee immediately jumps at the opportunity. See what hilarity and adventures ensue as this witty writer travels to the Caribbean to try to save her career.

Will she successfully pitch her new show to a powerful streaming service executive?

Who will she meet along the way?

Could there even be a chance for love?

“Bahamian Rhapsody” is a Romantic Comedy Visual Novel and Dating sim set in the sunny Bahamas. Hop on board and see if you can help Kaylee turn this Caribbean Conference into an Exotic Escapade filled with romance and adventure!

Features

- A charming and hilarious storyline in a tropical setting.
- Beautiful Anime influenced character art
- Classy Modern Jazz Soundtrack
- Multiple endings based on your choices
